title: Caninabis
creator_credit: Kaj Pindal, Gaston Sarault and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Caninabis is an animated film about a dog whose brilliant career on the drug squad collapses when he mistakes a truckload of fertilizer for marijuana, causing an uncalled-for “bust”. He is the victim of “burn-out”, brought on by protracted smoking of drugs. The film’s message is clear: smoking marijuana is definitely not good for dogs. Award: Zagreb.
